query:
SELECT 
  'Frameworks' as entity, COUNT(*) as count FROM frameworks
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Controls', COUNT(*) FROM controls
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Articles', COUNT(*) FROM articles
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Users', COUNT(*) FROM users
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Organizations', COUNT(*) FROM organizations;
